channel.title: Contacts on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Filter
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Filter Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop parameters > Contact > Contact tab Contacts page is well displayed Filter by id_contact = 2 > Click Search Number of contacts < total of contacts All rows column ‘id_contact’ contains ‘2’ Click on Reset Filter is reset Number of contacts after reset = total of contacts Filter by name = Customer service Number of contacts < total of contacts

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - CRUD
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop parameters > Contacts > Contacts tab Contacts page is well displayed Click Add new contact button Page title contains ‘Add new:’ Create contact (faker data) Message Successful creationÂ is displayed Number of contacts after creation = total of contacts + 1 Filter list by email with latest email of created contact Contact is displayed in list Click on the pen to edit the contact Page title contains ‘Edit:’ Update contact

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Bulk actions
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Bulk actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop parameters > Contacts > Contacts Tab Contacts page is well displayed Create 2 contacts using the following test Number of contacts after creation = total of contacts + 2 Go to BO > Shop parameters > Contacts > Contacts tab Contacts page is well displayed Click Add new contact button Page title contains ‘Add new:’ Create contact

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Filter, sort and pagination
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Contacts - Filter, sort and pagination Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop parameters > Contacts > Contacts Tab Contacts page is well displayed Sort by id_contact desc List is sorted by id_contact desc (3 -> 2 -> 1) Sort By title asc List is sorted by title asc (a -> b -> c) Sort by title desc List is sorted by title desc
